data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Parses RCS files directly to trace code ownership over time. From
    that further statistics such as code churn, commit rates, and
    developer input can be measured.

    While there are other RCS modules in CPAN (RCS, RCS::Agent, and
    VCS::RCS::Parser), they do not do the work of tracking the code to
    produce statistics. Nor would it make sense for them to.
